title: What is Mesmeric language and how can it activate human potential through symbols and imagery?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the Mesmeric language, which activates human potentials and helps us use all our faculties. Symbols are a key element of this language since they activate the mind. The author argues that reasoning alone can often lead to confusion and that instincts are essential in satisfying human needs. The Mesmeric language teaches humans holistically by using imagery and symbols to communicate with both cerebral hemispheres simultaneously. The last 200 tokens present two forms of Mesmeric language: ancient and modern, with the former being a more challenging interpretation. The purpose of the ancient Mesmeric language is to keep non-initiates from comprehension, to help beginners learn starting with the level of images, and to serve as a symbol.

last_phrase: Learning the symbolic magnetic language can transform a person and develop their understanding and functionality in the world. Symbols work at all levels of reality, even those beyond our perception. The use of images and symbols in teaching allows for a broader interpretation and a whole-person approach to understanding.
